note.p: Education: Gonville and Caius College, Cambridge. BA (1812), MA (1815)
Career: Called to the Bar at Middle Temple (1813); High Steward of Lincoln
References: Eric H Mansfield, 'The Miller of Sneinton', review of D M Cannell, George Green, Mathematician & Physicist 1793-1841 in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 321-322
M V Wilkes, 'Herschel, Peacock, Babbage and the Development of the Cambridge Curriculum' in NR 1990 vol 44 pp 205-219
